data.enText: to give comfort or sympathy to sb who is unhappy or disappointed
Nothing could console him when his wife died.
data.chText: 他妻子去世后，什么事情也不能使他感到宽慰。

data.enText: She put a consoling arm around his shoulders.
data.chText: 她搂住他肩膀以示安慰。

data.enText: Console yourself with the thought that you did your best.
data.chText: 你可以安慰自己的是你已经尽了最大的努力。

data.enText: I didn't like lying but I consoled myself that it was for a good cause.
data.chText: 我不愿意撒谎，但我安慰自己那是出于好意。

data.hoverText: 动词+名词短语+直接引语

data.enText: a flat surface which contains all the controls and switches for a machine, a piece of electronic equipment, etc.
data.chText: （机器、电子设备等的）控制台，操纵台，仪表板

simple_means.memory_skill: con- 共同,一起 + sol 安慰;安抚 + -e

means: (机器、电子设备等的)控制台，操纵台，仪表板

tr: housing for electronic instruments, as radio or television
an ornamental scroll-shaped bracket (especially one used to support a wall fixture)
example: the bust of Napoleon stood on a console

tr: a scientific instrument consisting of displays and an input device that an operator can use to monitor and control a system (especially a computer system)
a small table fixed to a wall or designed to stand against a wall
give moral or emotional strength to

value.boxr_value: The verb is pronounced /kən'səʊl/. The noun is pronounced /'kɒnsəʊl/. 动词读作 /kən'səʊl/，名词读作 /'kɒnsəʊl/。

example.ex: Often they cry, and I have to play the role of a mother, consoling them...
example.tran: 经常他们一哭，我就要充当母亲的角色抚慰他们。

example.ex: He will have to console himself by reading about the success of his compatriots...
example.tran: 他只能读读同胞们成功的故事来安慰自己。

example.ex: I can console myself with the fact that I'm not alone...
example.tran: 不是只有我一个人才这样，我可以用这一事实来安慰自己。

example.ex: He consoled himself that Emmanuel looked like a nice boy, who could be a good playmate for his daughter.
example.tran: 他安慰自己说，伊曼纽尔看上去是个不错的男孩，会是女儿的好玩伴。

gramarinfo.label: Also V n <l>with/for</l> n, V n that

value.def: If you console someone who is unhappy about something, you try to make them feel more cheerful.

example.ex: It is not a consoling thought to Germans to see that Americans have the same kind of problem, too.
example.tran: 看到美国人也碰到了同样的问题，德国人并不会感到安慰。

example.ex: The only consolation for the Scottish theatre community is that they look likely to get another chance...
example.tran: 对苏格兰戏剧界来说，唯一感到安慰的就是他们看来可能还有一个机会。

example.ex: He knew then he was right, but it was no consolation.
example.tran: 当时他知道自己是正确的，但这并不能给他任何安慰。

value.def: A console is a panel with a number of switches or knobs that is used to operate a machine.
value.tran: (机器的)操纵台，控制台，仪表板
